entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 8:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 17. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
